name: The Bad Gravedigger
description: You have to explore and find a way out of the accursed cemetery of Aynkaria. On the way, you are waiting for ghosts, screamers and a parallel world. Carefully inspect the game locations and read the notes to find clues.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-530 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series / AMD Radeon HD 4000 series 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 series / AMD Radeon HD 6000 series 1 GB VRAM. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
